channel.title: Thinking Spatially
channel.itunes:summary: Why does thinking spatially and geographically still matter in our 21st Century world? Join geographer Joseph Kerski as we explore natural hazards, population trends, biodiversity, energy, water, and other important issues, how geotechnologies and maps can serve as tools for investigation, and dig into issues of location privacy and data quality along the way.
channel.itunes:author: Joseph Kerski
channel.itunes:subtitle: Adventures in Space, Place, Maps, and Geotechnology

item.title: 10 Useful and Amazing Web Mapping Applications
item.description:
